content: 4 welcome to doodles founded in 2020 by designer and author jamie lomax she/her doodles by pacific knit co have ignited something unique in the fiber community a modern and fun movement to empower makers to learn to design and knit exactly what they want when i first started knitting i spent hours learning how to alter a pattern and do the math to create exactly what i wanted now i design patterns that encourage adventurous beginners to take on a new challenge with me doodle patterns encourage creativity within our easy- to-follow doodle framework minimizing guesswork while building valuable skills you can use again and again every pattern and motif across the entire doodle collection is designed to fit together seamlessly allowing for complete customization base patterns with easy modifications included mix-and-match thematic colorwork charts thank you for purchasing my pattern please email easy to follow color palette tips me for pattern support questions or general info every doodle theme is available in multiple formats so you can choose the one that works for you www pacificknitco com doodle card decks portable & collectable cards pacificknitco digital full pattern pdf instructions and tutorials charts only pdf add to any base pattern @pacificknitco check out our full library of doodle collections and join the doodle movement to learn to design and knit support@pacificknitco com anything you want seriously it s endless customization with just one pattern be sure to tag me @pacificknitco you may also enjoy pattern usage and rights doodle patterns doodle brand name and all doodle charts located within any version of digital or physical materials are the exclusive copyright of pacific knit co and are intended for personal use only patterns and/or charts may not be used and/or resold in personal designs or patterns finished items made from this pattern may be sold in limited quantities with credit for the pattern provided to pacific knit co thank you for tagging me and my pattern when sharing pattern credits sample knit erin shursen dumpster fire doodle i voted doodle pacific knit co © 2026 | www pacificknitco com | #pkccraftivistdoodle page 5
